Class MouseListenerForGamePanel.Action

java.lang.Object
  jmines.control.listeners.MouseListenerForGamePanel.Action
Enclosing class:
MouseListenerForGamePanel
public static final class MouseListenerForGamePanel.Action
extends Object

The class used to store a game mouse action.
